text:
What do you mean by “standalone”?  It’s not currently possible for it to be a single file for two reasons:
• The JS/CSS/etc assets aren’t artifacted
• Even were it artifacted, PackageCompiler would still distribute it as a folder — it may be possible in the future for it to bundle a pseudo-fs embedded into the a single file, but that work hasn’t been done yet
